title: PHP__halt_compilerFunction

metadata.description: Learn about PHP__halt_compilerFunction with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Definition and Usage
The __halt_compiler() function halts the compiler execution.
Syntax
__halt_compiler()
Technical Details
Return Value:
Nothing
PHP Version:
5.1+

★
+1
